- Titanic (1997)): A romantic drama set aboard the ill-fated Titanic during its maiden voyage in 1912. The story revolves around a wealthy aristocrat named Jack Dawson, who falls in love with a kind but poor artist named Rose DeWitt-Boreman, during their voyage. The movie is known for its epic scale, stunning visual effects, and memorable music score. The film received widespread critical acclaim upon its release in 1997, and has since become one of the most popular and critically acclaimed movies ever made.

- Witless Protection (2008)): A science fiction action comedy film directed by Paul Mazursky and starring John Travolta, Richard Gere, Uma Thurman, Keanu Reeves, and Lili Taylor. The story revolves around a small town sheriff named Louis Batiste, who witnesses what he believes to be an attempted kidnapping when his daughter is taken from their home in the middle-class lifestyle of the town. Louis Batiste immediately begins investigating the mysterious events that have been occurring in the town lately, including mysterious deaths and disappearances of local residents, including children. Louis Batiste soon discovers that the mysterious deaths and disappearances of local residents, including children, are actually the result of a malevolent extraterrestrial force operating from within an uncharted planet located some millions of miles away from Earth. The extraterrestrial force operating from within the uncharted planet is known as the Lilita Corporation.
